hyperaggregate.netutils package¶

Submodules¶

hyperaggregate.netutils.abstract_message_router module¶

class hyperaggregate.netutils.abstract_message_router.AbstractMessageRouter(address, debug_mode=False)¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Boilerplate class that starts a socket and routes messages it receives to appropriate callback function based on the type of messages. This class only provides getters to internal attributes or hides them in order to protect integrity of the state of the attributes of the object

property address¶

Returns the address that socket is running on

Returns

The address of the socket

Return type

str

property debug¶

Returns whether debug mode is active

Returns

Is debug mode active

Return type

bool

abstract register_callbacks()¶

Method that should return a dictionary of message types as keys associated with their coresponding callbacks as values

Return type

dict(MessageType, (str, object) => ())

send(address, message)¶

Function aimed at simplyfing code and hiding socket object

Parameters

  • address (str) – The address of the sender of the message

  • message (object) – The message

start()¶

Initializes callbacks and starts the socket

stop()¶

Stops the socket

hyperaggregate.netutils.message module¶

class hyperaggregate.netutils.message.Message(message_type, payload=None)¶

Bases: object

The class representing messages exhanged between nodes on the network

class hyperaggregate.netutils.message.MessageType(value)¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Enum of possible message types

AGGREGATION_SIGNUP = 2¶
FINAL_PARTIAL_SHARES = 6¶
GROUP_ASSIGNMENT = 4¶
HEALTH_CHECK = 0¶
HEALTH_CONFIRMATION = 1¶
MODEL_UPDATE = 7¶
NO_MODEL_NEEDED = 8¶
PARTIAL_MODEL_SHARE = 5¶
SIGNUP_CONFIRMATION = 3¶

hyperaggregate.netutils.zmqsockets module¶

class hyperaggregate.netutils.zmqsockets.MessageWrapper(sender_addr, dest_addr, message)¶

Bases: object

Message wrapper that includes important additional information with the message (namely sender and destination address)

class hyperaggregate.netutils.zmqsockets.ZMQDirectSocket(address, debug_mode=False)¶

Bases: object

Abstraction of peer to peer network communication interface implemented with ZeroMQ

property address¶

Returns the address that socket is running on

Returns

Address of the socket

Return type

str

send(dest_address, message)¶

Wraps a message and send it to the specified destination

Parameters

  • dest_address (str) – An address to send the message to

  • message (object) – The message

start(on_message_received_callback)¶

Initliaze process that waits for messages and the thread that processes them and starts them

Parameters

on_message_received_callback (function (str, object) => ()) – Function that accepts a sender address and the message payload when a message is received

stop()¶

Sets running indicator to false which stops the socket from receiving anymore messages (effectively stops message processing thread)

Module contents¶

Implements basis for network communication between nodes
